name: Shittalk O'Clock
description:
A Badgames™ Game created by Nastia Garachtchenko on the weekend.

Music by Kevin Macleod.

Almost all insults by @chuckNup .

Optimized for a controller, but if you want to play on a keyboard here are the controls:

arrow keys - move the player

Z - deliver the selected  letter

X - read the selected letter

A or D - select a letter in your inventory

ESC -  exit application
